settings.title: BUY CANADIAN!
settings.text:
Hey, I'm Sneaky Pete, welcome to my site! I've been a vaporizer enthusiast for a long time, and I'm also a passionate vaporizer advocate. If you're new to the vaporizing scene and don't know where to start, do not hesitate to reach out to me for advice and guidance. We're a small business that's big on customer service :)

All of our products are shipped from Canada, so you don't need to deal with the border or pay duty!

Thank you for stopping by!

Sneaky Pete

- Great White North Vaporizer Co.

settings.title: Functional and affordable glass.
settings.text_block: We have a glass guy.  He's awesome.  We get him to custom make water pieces and adapters to work with the most popular vaporizers on the market.  Water cooled vapour is the best, check out some great pieces here.

settings.heading: Free Tracked Shipping In Canada Over $100

settings.assurance_text: Free shipping for orders over $100 within Canada. Fast, low-cost and discrete shipping worldwide.

settings.subtitle: Check out some of the top-rated brands we carry

settings.product-text: The Medium Brilliant Cut Grinder is the one we recommend if you don’t know which grinder to buy. It produces a uniform, fluffy, medium grind that will work for all your needs. The medium grinder is the most versatile of the 3 grinders and is sure to satisfy.
